name: A Business Power
description: Can you Become the Number One?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and Up Processor: Intel Core i3 2nd Gen or AMD A4 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, NVIDIA GT730, AMD HD 5550 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Lowest Possible Resolution is 720p or 1280x720
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and Up Processor: Intel Core i3 6th Gen or AMD A8 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, NVIDIA GT730, AMD HD 5550 Storage: 250 MB available space
